sn12.51:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn12.51:2.1: “Kittāvatā nu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivīmaṃsamāno parivīmaṃseyya sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti?
sn12.51:2.2: “Bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu vata, bhante, bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn12.51:2.3: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn12.51:2.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
sn12.51:3.2: ‘yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṃ;
sn12.51:3.3: idaṃ nu kho dukkhaṃ kiṃnidānaṃ kiṃsamudayaṃ kiṃjātikaṃ kiṃpabhavaṃ?
sn12.51:3.4: Kismiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kismiṃ asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī’ti?
sn12.51:3.6: ‘yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṃ, idaṃ kho dukkhaṃ jātinidānaṃ jātisamudayaṃ jātijātikaṃ jātippabhavaṃ.
sn12.51:3.7: Jātiyā sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātiyā asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī’ti.
sn12.51:4.1: So jarāmaraṇañca pajānāti, jarāmaraṇasamudayañca pajānāti, jarāmaraṇanirodhañca pajānāti, yā ca jarāmaraṇanirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti, tathā paṭipanno ca hoti anudhammacārī;
sn12.51:4.2: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno jarāmaraṇanirodhāya.
sn12.51:5.2: ‘jāti panāyaṃ kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā, kismiṃ sati jāti hoti, kismiṃ asati jāti na hotī’ti?
sn12.51:5.5: bhave sati jāti hoti, bhave asati jāti na hotī’ti.
sn12.51:6.1: So jātiñca pajānāti, jātisamudayañca pajānāti, jātinirodhañca pajānāti, yā ca jātinirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti, tathā paṭipanno ca hoti anudhammacārī;
sn12.51:6.2: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno jātinirodhāya.
sn12.51:7.10: saṅkhārā panime kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā;
sn12.51:7.11: kismiṃ sati saṅkhārā honti, kismiṃ asati saṅkhārā na hontī’ti?
sn12.51:7.14: avijjāya sati saṅkhārā honti, avijjāya asati saṅkhārā na hontī’ti.
sn12.51:8.1: So saṅkhāre ca pajānāti, saṅkhārasamudayañca pajānāti, saṅkhāranirodhañca pajānāti, yā ca saṅkhāranirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti, tathā paṭipanno ca hoti anudhammacārī;
sn12.51:8.2: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno saṅkhāranirodhāya.
sn12.51:9.1: Avijjāgato yaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo puññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ.
sn12.51:9.2: Apuññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, apuññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ.
sn12.51:9.3: Āneñjañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti āneñjūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ.
sn12.51:9.4: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjā pahīnā hoti vijjā uppannā, so avijjāvirāgā vijjuppādā neva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti na apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti na āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti.
sn12.51:9.5: Anabhisaṅkharonto anabhisañcetayanto na kiñci loke upādiyati;
sn12.51:9.6: anupādiyaṃ na paritassati, aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn12.51:9.7: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn12.51:10.1: So sukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, sā aniccāti pajānāti, anajjhositāti pajānāti, anabhinanditāti pajānāti.
sn12.51:10.2: Dukkhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, sā aniccāti pajānāti, anajjhositāti pajānāti, anabhinanditāti pajānāti.
sn12.51:10.3: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, sā aniccāti pajānāti, anajjhositāti pajānāti, anabhinanditāti pajānāti.
sn12.51:10.4: So sukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati.
sn12.51:10.5: Dukkhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati.
sn12.51:10.6: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati.
sn12.51:11.1: So kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānāti, jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānāti.
sn12.51:11.2: Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissanti, sarīrāni avasissantīti pajānāti.
sn12.51:12.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso kumbhakārapākā uṇhaṃ kumbhaṃ uddharitvā same bhūmibhāge paṭisisseyya.
sn12.51:12.2: Tatra yāyaṃ usmā sā tattheva vūpasameyya, kapallāni avasisseyyuṃ.
sn12.51:12.3: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānāti, jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānāti.
sn12.51:12.4: Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissanti, sarīrāni avasissantīti pajānāti.
sn12.51:13.2: api nu kho khīṇāsavo bhikkhu puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā abhisaṅkhareyya apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā abhisaṅkhareyya āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā abhisaṅkhareyyā”ti?
sn12.51:14.1: “Sabbaso vā pana saṅkhāresu asati, saṅkhāranirodhā api nu kho viññāṇaṃ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:15.1: “Sabbaso vā pana viññāṇe asati, viññāṇanirodhā api nu kho nāmarūpaṃ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:16.1: “Sabbaso vā pana nāmarūpe asati, nāmarūpanirodhā api nu kho saḷāyatanaṃ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:17.1: “Sabbaso vā pana saḷāyatane asati, saḷāyatananirodhā api nu kho phasso paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:18.1: “Sabbaso vā pana phasse asati, phassanirodhā api nu kho vedanā paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:19.1: “Sabbaso vā pana vedanāya asati, vedanānirodhā api nu kho taṇhā paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:20.1: “Sabbaso vā pana taṇhāya asati, taṇhānirodhā api nu kho upādānaṃ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:21.1: “Sabbaso vā pana upādāne asati, upādānanirodhā api nu kho bhavo paññāyethā”ti.
sn12.51:22.1: “Sabbaso vā pana bhave asati, bhavanirodhā api nu kho jāti paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:23.1: “Sabbaso vā pana jātiyā asati, jātinirodhā api nu kho jarāmaraṇaṃ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12.51:24.1: “Sādhu sādhu, bhikkhave, evametaṃ, bhikkhave, netaṃ aññathā.
sn12.51:24.2: Saddahatha me taṃ, bhikkhave, adhimuccatha, nikkaṅkhā ettha hotha nibbicikicchā.
